Class ServerLib

  • java.lang.Object
    • ServerLib
  • public class ServerLib
extends java.lang.Object
    Main library class for Project 3.

    Defines a set of functions for accessing Cloud services (eg., startVM), performing front-end tier operations (eg., getNextRequest), and doing middle-tier operations (eg., processRequest).

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      ServerLib​(java.lang.String cloudip, int cloudport)
      Constructor- Must provide Cloud RMI registry ip address and port.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void drop​(Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request r)
      Middle tier operation to drop the given request.
      void dropHead()
      Frontend operation to drop the next request in the queue of this Server.
      void dropTail()
      Frontend operation to drop the last request in the queue of this Server.
      void endVM​(int id)
      Cloud Service to stop a VM immediately.
      Cloud.DatabaseOps getDB()
      Method returns remote reference to database.
      Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request getNextRequest()
      Frontend operation to get the next client request in the queue of this Server (may block and wit if needed).
      int getQueueLength()
      Frontend operation to get the length of the queue at this Server.
      Cloud.CloudOps.VMStatus getStatusVM​(int id)
      Cloud Service returns status of a VM; Can be NonExistent, Booting, Running, or Ended.
      float getTime()
      Method returns time of day for simulation [0-24)
      void interruptGetNext()
      Frontend operation to interrupt any blocked getNextRequest call.
      void processRequest​(Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request r)
      Middle tier operation to process and send back reply for the given request using the default DB.
      void processRequest​(Cloud.FrontEndOps.Request r, Cloud.DatabaseOps DB)
      Middle tier operation to process and send back reply for the given request using the specified DB.
      boolean register_frontend()
      Frontend operation to register this Server with the load balancer and start receiving client requests.
      void shutDown()
      Unregister frontend (if needed) and shut down server queue; Use this to allow Server to exit cleanly.
      int startVM()
      Cloud Service to start a new "VM", which will run the Server class after booting.
      boolean unregister_frontend()
      Frontend operation to unregister from load balancer and stop receiving any more requests.
